abstract: Congress today summoned executives from Facebook, Google, and Yahoo to inquire about how they are tracking consumers for advertising purposes. The hearing signals an increasing interest on Washington’s part into what online companies are doing with all the data they have on their customers.
snippet: Congress today summoned executives from Facebook, Google, and Yahoo to inquire about how they are tracking consumers for advertising purposes. The hearing signals an increasing interest on Washington’s part into what online companies are doing wit...
lead_paragraph: Congress on Thursday summoned executives from Facebook, Google, and Yahoo to inquire about how they are tracking consumers for advertising purposes. The hearing signals an increasing interest on Washington’s part into what online companies are doing with all the data they have on their customers.

headline.main: Congress Looks Into How Online Companies Track Consumers

abstract: With its settlement with authors and publishers pending, Google rolls out new features to its Book Search service that make searching and finding books easier.
snippet: With its settlement with authors and publishers pending, Google rolls out new features to its Book Search service that make searching and finding books easier.
lead_paragraph: Google’s plans to expand the scope of its Book Search service are running into static. A class action settlement with publishers and authors over Google’s book-scanning project appears to be facing a growing tide of opposition.

abstract: Google invested an additional $2.5 million in 23andMe, the biotechnology start-up co-founded by Sergey Brin’s wife, Anne Wojcicki.
snippet: Google invested an additional $2.5 million in 23andMe, the biotechnology start-up co-founded by Sergey Brin’s wife, Anne Wojcicki.
lead_paragraph: Google has invested an additional $2.6 million in 23andMe, the personal genetics company co-founded by Anne Wojcicki, who is the wife of Sergey Brin, a Google co-founder.

headline.main: Google Invests Again in Company of Co-Founder’s Wife
